Reviews.Title: Great for the money
Reviews.Author: Charles Peale "car guy"
Reviews.Content: Bought this to keep an eye on our horse who was about to give birth.  It's about 180 feet to the barn and it's works perfectly as long as I have a clear line of site from the barn to the house.It's setup on our bedroom TV and we can keep an eye on our mare and new born colt without going outto the barn.  Setup was easy, pairing was done simply before I installed.  No real complaints, except night vision is a bit hazy.  It also has a one way mic, barn to the house.  Wish It had a mic back to the barn.  Wind noise on the mic is a problem, but we just mute the TV.  Would buy this unit again.

Reviews.Title: Terrible
Reviews.Author: AZ
Reviews.Content: I purchased a Q-See security system which included two of these cameras.  Although they are color cameras, the colors they produce in the daylight are off (red is green, green is black, etc.).  In addition, the cameras produce poor range (less than 20ft).  With that said, night time performance is adequate, you get about 6ft of night vision in black and white of course.A friend of mine purchased a Lorex security system with two wireless cameras which produce true colors during the day and give much better range.

Reviews.Title: Wireless camera with very poor limited reception range
Reviews.Author: Bruno
Reviews.Content: I bought 2 of these cameras. There isn't one thing good about them.The main problem is reception. One camera was mounted above my garage door at the end of my driveway. The receiver was placed in a side window of my house at the front of the driveway. It is not line of sight because there is a bay window on the side of the house between the garage and the front window but the distance between the camera and the receiver is only about 60 feet through open air. Reception is sporadic even with the receiver right up against the window. If you approach or stand near the camera there is no reception at all. No reception when someone approaches the camera defeats the purpose of having a camera.The other camera is located on the front of the house about 20 feet from the receiver. While I get full time reception from that camera I cannot move either the camera or receiver an inch or I lose the picture.The audio pickup on the cameras is poor. They pick up random noises and voice but nothing consistently or reliably.The video picture on both cameras is very choppy even at the highest setting.Night vision is decent but what good is that if you're not getting reliable reception. Changing channels does not help.I do not recommend these wireless cameras.

Reviews.Title: Not worth it for a wireless camera
Reviews.Author: CL
Reviews.Content: I didn't like this camera at all. The range was terrible, granted I was trying to get a signal through an obstructed view. (through a ext. wall). But I figured I try it out. The picture quality when it did work wasn't great either. I ended up returning it and buying a Lorex wireless instead (this one) Lorex Digital Wireless Outdoor Security Camera with Audio LW2220 . It worked in the same application unlike the Qsee, and the picture quality is great. I should clarify that use a Qsee dvr and hard wired Qsee cameras.

Reviews.Title: works just fine
Reviews.Author: J. Dean Pratt "JDP"
Reviews.Content: Once I figured out that the camera transmission was conflicting with my router, I changed channels on my wifi settings, and the camera worked great. Now I need to figure out how to purchase just the camera's, since the receiver will handle up to 4 of them.

Reviews.Title: best security camera it;s so good im buying another one..thank you.
Reviews.Author: anthony frye
Reviews.Content: the picture is really great day or night.my bother saw my system on at night now he is going to buy one to.i was really surprise of the quality of the camera.iv bought stuff before that was cheaper then the same stuff on a different site and yes i got what i payed for;no good.but on here on Amazon iv bought a few things for the first time and its been great.oh i did buy another system;Q-See QSDT404C Digital Wireless Camera with Receiver..i will be buying more stuff on here at first i just did not know if this was a good place to buy stuff. i know now its the first place il try to find anything i need..THANK YOU  AMAZON..

Reviews.Title: good resolution,
Reviews.Author: baron
Reviews.Content: the only thing I didn't like is the rf signal is line of sight and only about 100-150 ftIt seems to be doing well outside too

Reviews.Title: what you see is what you get
Reviews.Author: malyph
Reviews.Content: Instructions not the best in the world.The claims about usable distance seem to be way off base. Not much good if you can't get a signal from the camera. Looking for a way to extend the signal.

Reviews.Title: horible camera
Reviews.Author: sporty1
Reviews.Content: I would not recommend bad products to anybody so this is a bad useless wireless camera...sorry q-see its just the truth
